Blackfang had heard the conversation and joined.

Blackfang: Well, even if we did leave it to you - which, by the way, 
I'm all disposed to do - how would even even leave this rock? The 
only ship in flying conditions is the Tripred's own. 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Shadowcaster smiled and winked before reminding the
> young Maximal of his old 'party trick' by cloaking.
> "Just leave that to me..." he said quietly but
> confidently.
> 
>  --- OMWOS <o_mighty_wife_of_shinigami@y...>
> wrote: 
> ---------------------------------
> Slowly a wide grin spead across the feline Maximals
> face and he sat up. 
> He arched his back, the sounds of whirling gears and
> wire hummed around 
> him as his frame contorted, coling in and out as he
> switched from beast 
> mode to robot mode, standing shorter then
> Shadowcaster. User, it was 
> great to see an old face back from the Matrix, even if
> he did go insane 
> for awhile.
> 
> He grinned but the smile faded from the feral bot. He
> gave a slow nod 
> of his head. "Yeah, but how are we going to do that?
> We can't just 
> waltz in and say hey remember us?"
> 
> OMWOS
> 
> 
>
